summary: Completed testing of three bug fixes: 1) Customers page Excel import/export, 2) Vendors page Excel import/export, 3) Service Request form General Services category. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Customers.js: Excel import/export functionality correctly implemented with Template, Export, and 'Import from Excel' buttons
Vendors.js: Excel import/export functionality correctly implemented with Template, Export, and 'Import from Excel' buttons
CustomerService.js: General Services category now has proper parameters for Infrastructure, Interior, Building inspection
getDefaultTestMeasurements() function returns proper fields for General Services instead of null
seed_data_creation: Test service request created and deleted during testing (SRN/2026/044)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Three bug fixes verified: 1) Customers page has Excel import/export (Template, Export, Import from Excel buttons), 2) Vendors page has same functionality, 3) General Services category in Service Request form works without errors and shows Infrastructure/Interior/Building parameters.

Building parameters: Structural Integrity, Roof Condition, Plumbing Status, Ventilation, General Cleanliness
